mapper.select: select a.PATNT_NO, a.RPATNT_DTTM, a.RECPT_CLNC, a.EMP_NO, a.RSVT_RESN, a.RSVT_NO, a.RPATNT_TIME, b.PATNT_NM from resve_patient a, patient b where a.patnt_no = b.patnt_no

select rsvt_no, a.patnt_no, patnt_nm, rpatnt_dttm, rpatnt_time, recpt_clnc , a.emp_no, emp_nm, rsvt_resn from resve_patient a, patient b, employee c where a.patnt_no = #{patntNo} and a.emp_no = c.emp_no and a.patnt_no = b.patnt_no order by rpatnt_dttm desc
select count(rsvt_no) from resve_patient a, patient b where 1=1 and a.patnt_no = b.patnt_no

select rsvt_no, a.patnt_no, patnt_nm, rpatnt_dttm, rpatnt_time, recpt_clnc , a.emp_no, emp_nm, rsvt_resn from resve_patient a, patient b, employee c where rsvt_no = #{rsvtNo} and a.emp_no = c.emp_no and a.patnt_no = b.patnt_no

select rsvt_no, a.patnt_no, patnt_nm, rpatnt_dttm, rpatnt_time, recpt_clnc , a.emp_no, emp_nm, rsvt_resn, patnt_telno from resve_patient a, patient b, employee c where rpatnt_dttm = #{rpatntDttm} and a.emp_no = c.emp_no and a.patnt_no = b.patnt_no
